import React from "react"; /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/iframe-has-title */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/no-redundant-roles */ function Contact({ contactData }) { return (

Contact

{contactData.description}

Location:

{contactData.location}

Email:

{contactData.email}

Call:

{contactData.call}

Loading
Your message has been sent. Thank you!
); } export default Contact;
